author: wjmelements
content: I want selfdestruct because via create2 I can use it to upgrade a contract without using SLOAD+DELEGATECALL. This is the superior upgrade pattern since Instanbul, and it got better in Berlin.

author: wjmelements
content: This is desirable behavior. I don't want to have to reset storage if I recreate it in the same transaction. See https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2936
